description:
"The Wedding Planner Toolkit" course will provide you with the insight you need to develop pricing for your wedding planning or day of coordinating services and can serve as a helpful guide when building your wedding packages.

In addition, you will learn how to produce an important tool that will enable you to learn more about your client's vision for their wedding.

In the final component of the course, we will explore creating wedding timelines and how to utilize the timeline on the "day of" to serve as a better partner to the other wedding vendors and help facilitate the "day of" details, while still adapting to the natural overall flow of the wedding day.

You will walk away with incredible tools that you can download, customize and use for your own wedding planning or day of coordinating business.
title: The Wedding Planner Toolkit
